ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | grpinvcl.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | grpinvcl.n | |- N = ( invg ` G ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` G ) = ( +g ` G ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` G ) = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 5 | 1, 3, 4 | #P_grpinveu | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ x e. B ) -> E! y e. B ( y ( +g ` G ) x ) = ( 0g ` G ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_riotacl | |- ( E! y e. B ( y ( +g ` G ) x ) = ( 0g ` G ) -> ( iota_ y e. B ( y ( +g ` G ) x ) = ( 0g ` G ) ) e. B ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ x e. B ) -> ( iota_ y e. B ( y ( +g ` G ) x ) = ( 0g ` G ) ) e. B ) |
| 8 | 1, 3, 4, 2 | #P_grpinvfval | |- N = ( x e. B |-> ( iota_ y e. B ( y ( +g ` G ) x ) = ( 0g ` G ) ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_fmptd | |- ( G e. Grp -> N : B --> B ) |
